data.title: Winding Rivers Library System
data.text: Edition Widescreen Description 1 videodisc (approximately 93 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in. two-dimensional moving image tdi rdacontent video v rdamedia videodisc vd rdacarrier Physical Medium 4 3/4 in. color rda Description digital rdatr optical rdarm surround rdacpc Dolby digital 5.1 Dolby digital 2.0 NTSC rdabs video file rdaft DVD video region 1 rdare Motion pictures lcgft Note Originally released as a motion picture in 2019. DVD special features: deleted scenes; gag reel; joke-O-Rama; Georgia film works; audio commentary by director Michael Dowse and Kumail Nanjiani ; and more. Cast Dave Bautista, Kumail Nanjiani, Karen Gillan, Betty Gilpin, Steve Howey, Mira Sorvino, Natalie Morales Summary When a mild-mannered Uber driver named Stu picks up a passenger who turns out to be a cop hot on the trail of a brutal killer, he's thrust into a harrowing ordeal where he desperately tries to hold onto his wits, his life, and his five-star rating Audience MPAA rating: R, for violence and language throughout, some sexual references and brief graphic nudity System Details DVD; widescreen (2.39:1) presentation; NTSC, region 1; English Dolby digital 5.1 and descriptive audio 5.1; Dolby digital 2.0 (Spanish, French), Language English, French or Spanish dialogue; Spanish and French subtitles; subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing (SDH); described video. Subject Ridesharing -- Drama. Police -- Drama. Genre/Form Fiction films. Feature films. Comedy films. Action and adventure films. Video recordings for the hearing impaired. Video recordings for people with visual disabilities. Added Author Dowse, Michael, film director. Bautista, David, 1969- actor. Nanjiani, Kumail, actor. Uwais, Iko, 1983- actor. Sorvino, Mira, actor. Gillan, Karen, 1987- actor. Gilpin, Betty, actor. Howey, Steve, actor. Morales, Natalie, actor. Tatro, Jimmy, 1992- actor.
